name: PAT_HRLY_CHRG_INFO
description: This table contains information on hourly charges on patient records.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: START_TIME
columns.description: The start time of an hourly charge on this patient contact.

columns.name: STOP_TIME
columns.description: The stop time of an hourly charge on this patient contact.

columns.name: CHARGE_HTR_ID
columns.description: This column contains the id of the hourly charge's hospital transaction record.

columns.name: PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the bed charge procedure record.

columns.name: UNIT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the department record where the bed charge was triggered.

columns.name: BCC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the cost center record associated with the bed charge.

columns.name: BCC_ID_COST_CENTER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the cost center.
